CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- HealingPlace 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 플레이어가 HealingPlace 건물 근처에 오면(TriggerEnter 발생) 체력을 회복시키는 Timer를 생성 -- 건물에서 떨어지면(TriggerLeave 발생) Timer 삭제

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Heal
CodeBlockMethod.Code: return function() if isvalid(PlayerEntity) and PlayerEntity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName ~= "DEAD" then local HealEffect = "9acc7ba7139143f9a3077dc9aca435cd" _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached(HealEffect, PlayerEntity, Vector3.zero, 0, Vector3.one, false) PlayerEntity.ExtendPlayerComponent:CalcDmg(-200) end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.PlayerComponent ~= nil then self.TimerId[TriggerBodyEntity.Name] = _TimerService:SetTimerRepeat(self:Heal(TriggerBodyEntity), 1, 0) end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity --------------------------------------------------------
if TriggerBodyEntity.PlayerComponent ~= nil then _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.TimerId[TriggerBodyEntity.Name]) self.TimerId[TriggerBodyEntity.Name] = nil end
